firstNightReminder: City guard may choose a character, they become a prisoner.
City guard may choose a character, they become a prisoner.
name: City guard
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a good character: If in the game, they become a prisoner.

firstNightReminder: Show Celebrity character token to 2 good players and 1 evil player.
name: Celebrity
ability: 3 players know you are in play, one of them is evil. When you die, all other players are drunk until dawn.

otherNightReminder: Show thumbs down if both townsfolk neighbours are alive or thumbs up if any are dead.
name: Houndmaster
ability: Each night*, learn if any of your townsfolk neighbours are dead.

name: Jezus Christ
ability: The 1st townsfolk to die at night does not. Your team loses on your 3rd dusk.

firstNightReminder: Point to a player who will most likely die the next night.
Point to a player who will most likely die the next night.
name: Conspirator
ability: Each night*, learn a player who will most likely die next night.

otherNightReminder: Show a character token of 1 Baker's neighbour, 1 character token not in play and 1 character token of any evil player's neighbour.
name: Baker
ability: You start knowing 3 characters, 1 is your neighbour, 1 is not in play and 1 is a neighbour to an evil player.

name: Archangel
ability: Minions are your alignment and don't learn who the demon is.

otherNightReminder: The Surgeon may choose a player, they die. The other player they learned is resurrected.
name: Surgeon
ability: You start knowing two players. Once per game, at night*, choose which one dies, the other is resurrected.

otherNightReminder: If the Falconer died tonight, they choose a player: show thumbs up if the chosen player or any of their neighbours are a demon or thumbs down if none is.
name: Falconer
ability: If you die at night, choose a player: learn if they or any of their neighbours are a demon.

otherNightReminder: The Private eye chooses a character, show thumbs up if they are in play or thumbs down if they are not. Once per game, you may show wrong information.
firstNightReminder: The Private eye chooses a character, show thumbs up if they are in play or thumbs down if they are not. Once per game, you may show wrong information.
name: Private eye
ability: Each night, choose a character: learn if they are in play. Once per game, you might learn wrong information.

name: Girlfriend
ability: You start knowing a good player. That player is drunk while you are alive.

otherNightReminder: Show a character of one player who died this night. Or shake your head if no one died.
name: Servant
ability: Each night*, learn 1 character who died at night. When the demon dies, you become the evil demon.

otherNightReminder: If the Shaman chose a character today, show that character's token to the player who became that character.
name: Shaman
ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a character. If not in the game, an alive player becomes that character at night.

otherNightReminder: One of the good Homeless's neighbours dies.
name: Homeless
ability: Each night*, one of your good neighbours die. Each day, if one alive player agrees, you are both drunk until dusk.

otherNightReminder: Choose if the Voayer chooses 2 players. The chosen players decide whether the Voayer dies.
name: Voayer
ability: Some nights*, choose 2 players which you have not chosen yet (not yourself): they choose whether you die.

firstNightReminder: Show a not in play townsfolk token and not in play minion token.
otherNightReminder: If the Acolyte died today or tonight, they choose which character they become. They are evil if they choose the minion.
name: Queen
ability: You start knowing a character in play. If they are executed, your team loses.

name: Prisoner
ability: While the City guard lives, you can't die. [+City guard]

otherNightReminder: Judas may choose a non-demon character to become. If they are in play, they die. Then wake that character's player and show them 'you are' and then Judas character token
name: Judas
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a non-demon character you become. If the character was in the game, they die and become a Judas.

otherNightReminder: Krampus chooses an alive player: if they are not a demon, they die. A player chosen the previous night might be resurrected.
name: Krampus
ability: Each night*, choose an alive player: If not a demon, they die and might be resurrected next night.

otherNightReminder: The Cockroach might learn who the evil demons are.
name: The Cockroach
ability: You think you are an outsider, but you are not. When you die, you learn who the evil demons are. [+1 evil outsider]

otherNightReminder: Basilisk chooses a player, wake them and show them 'this character selected you' token and then a Basilisk character token. All chosen player die this night if Basilisk died today or tonight.
name: Basilisk
ability: Each night*, you may choose a player: They learn who you are. If you die, all chosen players die this night.

otherNightReminder: Each good player chooses whether a neighbour dies.
name: One King
ability: Each good player may kill one of their alive neighbours each night*. If no one does, evil wins. Only 1 evil player can die at night. [+2 kings, -2 minions].

otherNightReminder: Ghuul is resurrected if they are dead and then chooses a player.
name: Ghuul
ability: Each night*, you are resurrected and choose a player: they die. Evil loses if & only if all minions are dead. [+1 minion]

otherNightReminder: Saint nicholas chooses a player. The Archangel might die if a player was mad about being a minion.
name: Saint Nicholas
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If a player was mad about being a minion, the Archangel might die at night. [+Krampus, +Archangel]

name: Chernobog
ability: You start knowing a player. When you die, they become a demon. Each night*, choose one of their alive neighbours: they die.
